channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Lockable Resources Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Lockable Resources Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-1003042|2024-08-05T03:07:16.802Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20lockable%20resources%20plugin
item.description: A cross site scripting vulnerability in Jenkins Lockable Resources Plugin 2.4 and earlier allows attackers able to control resource names to inject arbitrary JavaScript in web pages rendered by the plugin.
